articles.author: Anonna Dutt
articles.title: Dengue on steady rise, ICMR set to conduct vaccine trial - The Indian Express
articles.description: The ICMR, the country’s apex agency for formulation, coordination and promotion of biomedical research, has tied up with two biotech companies — Panacea and Serum Institute of India (SII) — to conduct phase-III trials of their dengue vaccines.
articles.content: With a steady increase in cases of dengue across the country from being restricted to only eight states and Union Territories in 2001 it is prevalent in all states states and UTs at present the India… [+1575 chars]

articles.title: New animal family tree raises questions about the origin of nervous systems - Ars Technica
articles.description: Sponges are more closely related to us than some animals with a nervous system.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ These complex creatures seem to be the earliest branch of the animal tree. We're more closely related to sponges than we are to them.

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 17 May 2023: Dark Sunspots - HT Tech
